nodes.text: The Zossi Belt was an asteroid belt located in the Faarlsun system, a part of the Parthovian Cluster in Wild Space. It occupied the second orbit around its star, the yellow-white Faarlsun.

The Zossi Belt was mentioned in the 1993 sourcebook Wanted by Cracken, written by Louis J. Prosperi for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Faarlsun system, and therefore the Zossi Belt, in grid square T-4.
